lead_paragraph: A court invader who shoved a visiting player at a Eurocup basketball game in Montenegro was sent sprawling to the deck by a punch from the player’s teammate.
snippet: A court invader who shoved a visiting player at a Eurocup basketball game in Montenegro was sent sprawling to the deck by a punch from the player’s teammate.

headline.main: Eurocup Basketball Player From U.S. Hits Fan Who Rushed Court
headline.print_headline: Eurocup Player From U.S. Hits Fan Who Rushed Court
